name: Dog's Muck Island v0.1b
description:
Dog's Muck Island is a short Gameboy game inspired by Link's Awakening's fetch quest. Play in your browser or on a real Gameboy.

v0.1b Initial release
This game is still in active development, so some parts of the game look pretty rough, and it may still have bugs, BUT it can be played start to finish. If you spot any issues, or have any feedback drop me a line :)

Keyboard controls:

Enter = Start/Pause
Z = Action
X = Jump
Arrow keys = Movement

(or use a gamepad)

If you get stuck, speak to the fortune teller...

Includes music by:

  • Ember#1765 / DeerTears
  • krümel (crumb)#0723
  • Tomas Danko

This game was developed in GBStudio.
